narratives.c_essay: I'm an avid runner, completing marathons while managing the care of my three Great Danes. Music from The All-American Rejects fuels my runs, but sweet potatoes? No thanks! My life's a balance of physical challenges and the joy my dogs bring, though it's not without its stresses.
narratives.p_intro: I'm here to challenge the narratives you've been fed. From public health to geopolitics and the looming tech fears, I'll give you the real scoop. Expect a mix of alarm bells and straight talk, with a dash of humor to keep things light. ðŸš¨
